name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】THE DAY ⧸ 重大告知あり！【#角巻わため生誕祭2023】 [R3hmYr58m6E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Happy Day to You!' by Tsunomaki Watame.
Instrumental transition scene with visual effects on stage.
MC section introducing the next song with on-screen text.
Performance of the song 'Dreaming Sheep' (夢見る羊) by Tsunomaki Watame.

subtitles.original: ふわふわ雲のわたあめ食べてみたり
subtitles.english: Maybe eat some fluffy cloud cotton candy

subtitles.original: 魔法を使って空を飛んだり
subtitles.english: Or fly through the sky using magic

subtitles.original: 誰かを救うヒーローになったり
subtitles.english: Or become a hero who saves someone

subtitles.original: なんでもできそうな気がするね
subtitles.english: I feel like I can do anything

subtitles.original: そんな奇跡みたいな日々を ずっと もっと
subtitles.english: Days like a miracle, forever, even more

subtitles.original: なんでもない日々はいじわるで
subtitles.english: Ordinary days can be unkind

subtitles.original: 唇噛みしめる時もあるよね
subtitles.english: There are times when we bite our lips

subtitles.original: 落ち込んでへこんでおかない顔
subtitles.english: A face that's feeling down and discouraged

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 笑顔がこぼれるよ
subtitles.english: It's okay, a smile will spill out

subtitles.original: 生まれてきたこと それを
subtitles.english: The fact that I was born...

subtitles.original: 後悔しちゃうかもしれない
subtitles.english: ...I might end up regretting it

subtitles.original: でもせっかくなら日々をもっと
subtitles.english: But if that's the case, let's make these days...

subtitles.original: Happiness Joyful ほら行こう！
subtitles.english: ...Happiness Joyful, hey, let's go!

subtitles.original: 小さな幸せつなぎあげて
subtitles.english: Connecting small happiness together

subtitles.original: 世界でひとつだけの宝物
subtitles.english: A treasure that's the only one in the world

subtitles.original: 君でいた証 抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Hold tight to the proof that you were you

subtitles.original: 生まれてきてくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for being born!

subtitles.original: 君も僕も君も一緒に
subtitles.english: You and I and you, together

subtitles.original: 同じ時に生まれた奇跡たち
subtitles.english: The miracles born at the same time

subtitles.original: 来年も再来年も一緒に
subtitles.english: Next year and the year after, together

subtitles.original: ここで笑ってお祝いしよう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh and celebrate here

subtitles.original: そんな奇跡みたいな日々を ずっと もっと
subtitles.english: Days like a miracle, forever, even more

subtitles.original: 叶えたい未来へ
subtitles.english: To the future I want to fulfill

subtitles.original: 心の準備OK？
subtitles.english: Ready in your heart?

subtitles.original: さあ、一歩踏み出して
subtitles.english: Now, take a step forward

subtitles.original: いっせーの、せ！
subtitles.english: One, two, go!

subtitles.original: 今日も楽しんでいきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's have fun today as well!

subtitles.original: 夢見る羊
subtitles.english: Dreaming Sheep

subtitles.original: 真白な羊に命が宿って
subtitles.english: Life dwelt within a pure white sheep

subtitles.original: 目覚めたんだ この大きな世界で
subtitles.english: And I woke up in this big world

subtitles.original: 何をしようか
subtitles.english: What shall I do?

subtitles.original: どこに行こうか
subtitles.english: Where shall I go?

subtitles.original: 冒険は始まった
subtitles.english: The adventure has begun

subtitles.original: ふらふらな足取りで弱々しく
subtitles.english: With wobbly steps and looking weak

subtitles.original: 声が震えてうまく鳴けない
subtitles.english: My voice trembles and I can't bleat well

subtitles.original: そんな自分やるせない
subtitles.english: I can't stand myself like that

subtitles.original: 自信喪失気味です
subtitles.english: I'm feeling a bit discouraged

subtitles.original: でも時間は進む
subtitles.english: But time moves forward

subtitles.original: 気持ちばかり焦る
subtitles.english: Only my feelings are impatient

subtitles.original: ゆっくりでいいから泣いちゃだめだよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to take it slow, so don't cry

subtitles.original: 叶えたい未来へ
subtitles.english: To the future I want to fulfill

subtitles.original: 心の準備OK？
subtitles.english: Is your heart ready?

subtitles.original: さあ、一歩踏み出して
subtitles.english: Now, take a step forward

subtitles.original: One Two Three!
subtitles.english: One Two Three!

subtitles.original: 僕は君と出会って
subtitles.english: I met you

subtitles.original: 自信を取り戻して
subtitles.english: And regained my confidence

subtitles.original: ゆっくりと今 確かに歩み出した
subtitles.english: Now, slowly and surely, I've started to walk

subtitles.original: 夢を見つけて
subtitles.english: Finding a dream

subtitles.original: いくつも抱きかかえて
subtitles.english: And holding many of them tight

subtitles.original: 君と話した
subtitles.english: The future I talked about...

subtitles.original: 未来を掴みに行こう
subtitles.english: ...with you, let's go grab it

subtitles.original: 一緒に隣歩いていこう
subtitles.english: Let's walk alongside each other

subtitles.original: まっすぐな羊に迷いはなくさ
subtitles.english: A straightforward sheep has no hesitation

subtitles.original: 走り出したなら急には止まれない
subtitles.english: Once you start running, you can't stop suddenly

subtitles.original: 周りを巻き込むそんな羊に今
subtitles.english: To become a sheep that involves everyone...

subtitles.original: なれる気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: ...now I feel like I can

subtitles.original: 明日を迎えたいくない日も
subtitles.english: Even on days when I don't want to face tomorrow

subtitles.original: 藍色な朝も昼も夜も
subtitles.english: In the indigo morning, noon, and night

subtitles.original: 半分こして食べ合って夢見よう
subtitles.english: Let's share and eat together, and dream

subtitles.original: このまま一緒に夜に溶けて
subtitles.english: Melting into the night together just like this

subtitles.original: 君と出会って
subtitles.english: I met you

subtitles.original: 自信を取り戻して
subtitles.english: And regained my confidence

subtitles.original: 泥まみれでも
subtitles.english: Even if covered in mud

subtitles.original: 何度も走り出した
subtitles.english: I've started running again and again

subtitles.original: 夢を...
subtitles.english: Dream...
